titles.title: Fixing the daily hour of meeting of the First Session of the One Hundred Ninth Congress.
Fixing the daily hour of meeting of the First Session of the One Hundred Ninth Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)
Sets the daily hour, until Monday, May 16, 2005, at: (1) 2 p.m. on Mondays; (2) 12 noon on Tuesdays; and (3) 10 a.m. on all other days of the week.
Sets the daily hour from Monday, May 16, 2005, until the end of the first session at: (1) 12 noon on Mondays; (2) 10 a.m. on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays; and (3) 9 a.m. on all other days of the week.
